modShortDescription: A trivial modlet that silences the flags at trading posts because they sound way too much like a shuffling zombie.
modDescription:
A trivial modlet that silences the flags at trading posts because they [sound](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-sound-mod/) way too much like a shuffling zombie.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LvvMzzsRpAz0864tqgFj2DliCTQotZsO/view?usp=sharing)**

**Credits:** [ModMangler](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/modmangler/), Flexible Games (modding video)
